title: ‘It’s On’: Pogačar And Pidcock’s Tuscan Tussle at Strade Bianche
content:
Strade Bianche favorites weigh in on journey into the unknown, adrenaline rushes and “brave” course change.

Read the full article at ‘It’s On’: Pogačar And Pidcock’s Tuscan Tussle at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
